name: FRAME 2
description:
FRAMES

Digital painting.

Through this collection we wanted to direct the experience of the architectural spaces that we carve.
To create a cinematic movement through the 3D space we framed a sequence of still images that represent a moment in space and time. 
Each frame directs the viewer through the experience of spatial qualities of the scenery.
We zoom in on topography and textures of surface to give you the pleasure of getting lost in the details of our carved landscapes.
Every piece of our work comes from a process that involves hand sculpting in different mediums, starting from physical sculpting and into a 3D digital hand sculpting technique. (Not generated)
